meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel bitter or resentful
meanings.sent1: Her constant criticism imbitters her friends.
meanings.sent2: The unfair treatment imbitters the employees.
meanings.sent3: The spoiled child imbitters the family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The broken promise imbitters the relationship.
meanings.sent5: The harsh reality imbitters their outlook on life.
